title: Slewacide
text:
Slewacide (1980–2000) was an American <a href="thoroughbred">thoroughbred</a> <a href="racehorse">racehorse</a> foaled in <a href="Oklahoma">Oklahoma</a>. He was out of the <a href="Buckpasser">Buckpasser</a> mare, Evasive, by the undefeated 1977 <a href="United%20States%20Triple%20Crown%20of%20Thoroughbred%20Racing">Triple Crown</a> winner, <a href="Seattle%20Slew">Seattle Slew</a>.
Raced only once, Slewacide is best known as the broodmare sire of <a href="Kentucky%20Derby">Kentucky Derby</a> and <a href="Preakness%20Stakes">Preakness Stakes</a> winner, <a href="Funny%20Cide">Funny Cide</a>.
Upon retirement, Slewacide produced such <a href="graded%20stakes%20race">stakes</a> winners as Clevor Trevor, Mr. Ross, and Slew of Damascus.
On September 2, 2000, he was <a href="animal%20euthanasia">euthanized</a> due to infirmities of old age.
